result.markdown:
---
title: "BaseballR"
---


Exploring the [baseballR](https://billpetti.github.io/baseballr/articles/baseballr.html) pacakge.

## Setup



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(baseballr)
```
:::



## Baseball reference

This gets standings on a particular date?


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bref_standings_on_date("2015-08-01", "NL East", from = FALSE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── MLB Standings on Date data from baseball-reference.com ─── baseballr 1.6.0 ──
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
ℹ Data updated: 2024-11-03 06:17:20 CST
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 5 × 8
  Tm        W     L `W-L%` GB       RS    RA `pythW-L%`
  <chr> <int> <int>  <dbl> <chr> <int> <int>      <dbl>
1 WSN      54    48  0.529 --      422   391      0.535
2 NYM      54    50  0.519 1.0     368   373      0.494
3 ATL      46    58  0.442 9.0     379   449      0.423
4 MIA      42    62  0.404 13.0    370   408      0.455
5 PHI      41    64  0.39  14.5    386   511      0.374
```


:::
:::


## Fangraph

Game-by-game batting statistics for a specific player:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fg_batter_game_logs(playerid = 6184, year = 2017)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── MLB Batter Game Logs data from FanGraphs.com ───────────── baseballr 1.6.0 ──
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
ℹ Data updated: 2024-11-03 06:17:25 CST
```


:::

## Statcast

This gathers data from here:

https://baseballsavant.mlb.com/statcast_leaderboard?year=2021&abs=50&type=batter


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
statcast_leaderboards(leaderboard = "exit_velocity_barrels", year = 2021)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── MLB Baseball Savant Statcast Leaderboards data from baseballsavant.mlb.com ──
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
ℹ Data updated: 2024-11-03 06:17:26 CST
```
